definition: to cover/to encase/cover/sheath/to overlap/to interleave/to model after/to copy/formula/harness/loop of rope/(fig.) to fish for/to obtain slyly/classifier for sets, collections/bend (of a river or mountain range, in place names)/tau (Greek letter Ττ)

sentences.english: He is wearing an olive green coat.
sentences.chinese: 他穿着件橄榄绿的外套。

sentences.english: Wear an outer layer of breathable, wind-resistant, water-resistant material.
sentences.chinese: 穿一件抗风防水材料制成的透气的外套。

sentences.english: His waistcoat is beneath his coat .
sentences.chinese: 这件外套是毛棉混纺的。

sentences.english: That’s more than three times as fast as sales of men’s and women’s luxury outerwear in 2010.
sentences.chinese: 这比2010年男女奢侈品牌外套销售的三倍还多。

sentences.english: This coat looks very good on you.
sentences.chinese: 那件外套你穿着很好看。

sentences.english: CHILLY】You will feel chilly if you don't wear a coat on a cold day.
sentences.chinese: 如果你在冷天不穿上外套，将会感觉冷。

sentences.english: She leaned on my chest. I could smell the fragrance of her blouse.
sentences.chinese: 妻斜靠在我胸部上，我还闻得到她外套上芳香的味道。

sentences.english: Choosing between a new sweater and a pair of concert tickets?
sentences.chinese: 是买件新外套还是两张去演唱会的票？

sentences.english: She was gobsmacked to find that the man in black coat was her classmate of primary school.
sentences.chinese: 她吃惊的发现那个穿黑外套的男人是她的小学同学。

sentences.english: The coat is too tight; it must be eased under the arms.
sentences.chinese: 这件外套太紧了，须在袖子下面放宽松点。

sentences.english: Shoes and boots go right onto the waterproof mat laid out next to the wall, , and coats go on the coat rack behind the door.
sentences.chinese: 鞋靴摆放在靠墙的防水垫上，外套挂在门后。

sentences.english: The albino drew a pistol from his coat and aimed the barrel through the bars, directly at the curator.
sentences.chinese: 他从外套中拔出手枪，将枪管透过铁栏杆瞄准了馆长。

sentences.english: It is pretty cold outside, you'd better put on my coat.
sentences.chinese: 天气相当地冷，你最好把我的外套穿上。

sentences.english: The weatherman forecasts snow for tomorrow, so bring a warm jacket.
sentences.chinese: 天气预报员预报明天有雪，所以带件暖和的外套吧。
